title: Malta Five-Star Oceanfront Luxury with Six Outdoor Pools
description:
Uncover the magic of the Mediterranean with a stay at the stunning Corinthia St George's Bay in Malta, a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 awarded, seafront resort. This sun-soaked hotel welcomes you with five-star elegance at every turn: pull up a sun lounger at one of the six superb outdoor swimming pools and enjoy the use of a private lido with direct ocean access. If you're feeling active, make your way to the watersports centre where paddleboarding, jet skis and private yacht hire is available. For a blissful escape from reality, schedule in a pampering treatment from Apollo by Dee Spa, where you can treat yourself to a dip in the jacuzzi or a soothing massage. When you're feeling peckish, there's eight restaurants and bars to choose from, serving everything from all-American grills to fresh seafood, Italian favourites and handcrafted cocktails.

Don't miss out on exploring Malta's exquisite sites during your stay. Check out the luminous waters at Blue Grotto, only a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Or head to the breathtaking Dingli Cliffs, an easy 30-minute drive away. Right on the hotel's doorstep is a host of incredible beach bars, restaurants, the Bay Street shopping complex and Malta Casino, all conveniently located around St George's Bay.
offer_address: St George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3301, Malta
